alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:48PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gosper and Furnas Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smithfield to 8 miles south of Beaver City. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elwood around 355 PM CDT. Smithfield around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hollinger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
